All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Advance
    This class represents the advance command.
    AdvanceTest
    Test to check that advance command works perfectly
    Aggresive
    concrete strategy class of Aggressive player.
    Airlift
    This class represents the airlift card.
    AirliftTest
    Test to check that airlift command works perfectly
    AllTests
    Test suite to run all the test classes of orders package
    AllTestsSuiteClass
    Test suite to run all the test classes in the project
    AssignArmies
    AssignArmies class that inherits GamePlay interface to support functions during this command
    Benevolent  
    Blockade
    Whenever blockade card is used, the player can triple the armies present in one of the country they control and in return looses control over that country, neutral player gets the control of the country.
    BlockadeTest
    Test to check that blockade command works perfectly
    Bomb
    This class represents the bomb card.
    BombTest
    Test to check that bomb command works perfectly
    Cheater
    This class has the behavior of the Cheater Player.
    Continent
    Continent in a Map
    ContinentTest
    Tests for Continent
    ControllerSuiteClass
    Test suite to run all the test classes in controller package
    Country
    Country in a Map
    CountryTest
    Tests Country class
    Deploy
    Players can place reinforcements to the countries they control.
    DeployTest
    Test to check that deploy command works perfectly
    Diplomacy
    This class represents the diplomacy card.
    DiplomacyTest
    Test to check that diplomacy card and negotiate command works perfectly.
    Dummy  
    EditPhase
    EditPhase is inherited from the Phase class to support commands valid in editing phase
    EndPhase
    This is the class that inherits GamePhase class whose fucntion is to print the winner of the game
    EntitiesSuiteClass
    Test suite to run all the test classes in entities package
    ExecuteOrders
    ExecuteOrder class that inherits GamePlay interface to support functions during this command
    Exit  
    GameEngine
    Game Engine class is the starting point of the game where commands are processed and extracted to support the functionalities provided by the commands.
    GameEngineTest
    GameEngine Test
    GameMap
    GameMap which holds variables which contains information continents, countries and neighbourhood between countries.
    GameMapTest
    Test for GameMap
    GamePhase
    GamePhase is inherited from the Phase class to support commands valid in game phase(general commands)
    GamePlay
    GamePlay class that inherits GamePhase to support gameplay compatible commands
    GameSetup
    Abstract class of game setup the represents the initial process of enetering the gameplay
    HumanPlayer  
    IssueOrders
    IssueOrder class that inherits GamePlay interface to support functions during this command
    LogEntryBuffer
    This is the class that inherits Observable class whose function is to obtain the outputs that are obtained after executing commands
    LogWriter
    The class that inherits Observer and whose function is to write the output to the log file
    MapopsSuiteClass
    Test suite to run all the test classes in mapops package
    MapValidation
    This class will validate the map of the game connection of all countries, continents with their respective countries mapping
    MapValidationTest
    This class performs Unit testing on every function of the MapValidation Class
    Observable
    Class that implements the connection/disconnection mechanism between observers and observables (subject).
    Observer
    Interface class for the Observer, which forces all views to implement the update method.
    Orders
    Interface implemented by all the order classes
    Phase
    An abstract class for the Phase implementation of state pattern
    Player
    Player in a game contains information about the continents and countries controlled by player, cards the player have, method to order input from user, queue to store player order and number of reinforcement armies player have.
    PlayerStrategy
    abstract class that is implemented by concrete strategy classes This is the class that declares the method to be implemented by the various strategies.
    PlayerTest
    Player class test case
    PostEdit
    PostEdit is inherited from the EditPhase class to support commands valid in post editing phase
    PostLoad
    Phase entered after preload class, it contains methods to add or remove players from game and to assign countries randomly to players.
    PreEdit
    PreEdit is inherited from the EditPhase class to support commands valid in pre editing phase
    PreLoad
    Phase entered after map is saved successfully or at the start of the game, it contains methods to load a map.
    RandomPlayer  
    ReadMap
    Class to read map file
    ReadMapTest
    Test for ReadMap
    UserCommand
    Main class from where game starts, user commands are taken from here..
    WriteMap
    Class to write into map file
    WriteMapTest
    Test for WriteMap
